entry.title: Kaweco Supra - Fountain Pens
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kaweco
Type: Pen, Fountain
Price: 0.00

Take Notice of this extraordinary innovative pen, decked with a 250 Kaweco nib and of all standard sizes EF / F / M / B / BB available. 

 

The trick to this pen is that there is a connecting piece included that extends the fountain pen by 3 cm. This gives you the option to use it as a pocket sized pen or extend it to a full length pen. Another exciting thing about this is, that you can totally notice the weight difference. In the long configuration you can also hold 2 standard size ink cartridges and use the long converter as well.

 

The SUPRA is made of pure eco brass, which means that it is lead-free. Each piece is subject to quality control and is assembled by hand. Try this massive Brass CNC turned wonder today. 

 

Measurements (closed/ open mounted cap): 130 / 165 mm

Nib Type: Stainless Steel EF / F / M / B / BB 

 

Kaweco Supra -- Quick Order Sheet

 

  • KW-10001001 - Kaweco - SUPRA FP - EF
  • KW-10001002 - Kaweco - SUPRA FP - F
  • KW-10001003 - Kaweco - SUPRA FP - M
  • KW-10001004 - Kaweco - SUPRA FP - B
  • KW-10001005 - Kaweco - SUPRA FP - BB
 

 

History


The Kaweco SUPRA is the big brother of the LILIPUT and a quick-change artist. The well-known ECO brass (brass manufactured by the Wieland Werke in Ulm) is lead-free. As usual brass will become tarnished when in use and develop an individual patina over time.


There are several possibilities to screw this pen together, for example the short version without cap and connecting piece, or the long version with connecting piece and cap. Therefore this fountain pen's weight and length can be adjusted to meet the individual needs of its user. The minimalistic design is reminiscent of Bauhaus and Braun.

Image Right: Quality check of the nibs, one at the time

entry.title: Kaweco Classic Sport - Fountain Pens
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kaweco
Type: Pen, Fountain
Price: 0.00

Info:

A wonderful compact fountain pen with steel nib and iridium made by famous nib manufacturer Peter Bock. This pen utilizes international standard ink cartridges for convenience. When this pen is closed it has a length of only 10.5 cm and is 13.5 cm when the cap is posted.

Available in the nib sizes EF / F / M / B / BB - with and without clip.

Made in Germany: 

Other Models & Links for This Series: 

  • Sport Classic -- Quick Order Sheet
  • Sport Classic Fountain Pens
  • Sport Classic Ballpens
  • Sport Classic Rollerballs
  • Sport Classic Push Pencil 0.7mm
  • Sport Classic Clutch Pencil 3.2mm

History:

In 1911 something remarkable by the name of Kaweco SPORT was created. A pocket fountain pen which could be carried everywhere. It only measured 10.5 cm when closed, but when the cap was mounted on top of the barrel, it grew to a standard sized pen.


Seppi Herberger already appreciated the features of this fountain pen. It was a Kaweco SPORT that commited his victorious tactics to paper. Tactics that made the German team win the World Cup in 1954. Kaweco's involvement in the sporting wold continued when in 1972 the Sport was marketed with a pendant for the Olympic Games being held in Munich Germany.  

 A wonderful PDF on the history of the Kaweco Sport series is available here. 


 Kaweco Sport Advertising, 1935 

 


The Kaweco Sport Classic has the same characteristics and comes in a colorful variety.

entry.title: Kaweco Ice Sport - Fountain Pens
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kaweco
Type: Pen, Fountain
Price: 0.00

Info:

A wonderful compact fountain pen with steel nib and iridium made by famous nib manufacturer Peter Bock. This pen utilizes international standard ink cartridges for convenience. When this pen is closed it has a length of only 10.5 cm and is 13.5 cm when the cap is posted.

Available in the nib sizes EF / F / M / B / BB - with and without clip.

Made in Germany 

Other Models & Links for This Series: 

  • Ice Sport Series -- Quick Order Sheet
  • Ice Sport Fountain Pens
  • Ice Sport Ballpens 
  • Ice Sport Rollerballs 
  • Ice Sport Push Pencil 0.7mm
  • Ice Sport Clutch Pencil 3.2mm

History:

Translucent stands for the idea to make the invisible visible. As early as the twenties Kaweco representatives were already equipped with a writing instrument cross section pen model. These cross section models were made by cutting serial products in half in order to make the interior mechanisms more visible. However, this process became unnecessary in the fifties through the further development of the injection molding technique. Translucent models were produced.


The Kaweco ICE Sport has the same characteristics and comes in a colorful variety.
